name: Center for Scholastic Inquiry
tag_list: academic-research-conference, business-research-conference, behavioral-science-research-conference, education-research-conference, professional-development, continuing-education, academic-journals, peer-reviewed-publications, academic-research, education-
overview:
The Center for Scholastic Inquiry hosts destination academic research conferences, publishes peer-reviewed academic journals and offers professional memberships to professionals and practitioners in multiple disciplines.

The Center for Scholastic Inquiry highlights academic research in education, business and behavioral sciences to support scholarship and establish a platform to recognize luminaries, pioneers and practitioners in the professions of education, business and behavioral sciences.

The Center for Scholastic Inquiry elevates the professions of education, business and behavioral science by fostering academic research, stimulating scholarship and endorsing thought leadership. Education, business and behavioral science professionals interested in enhancing their practice by learning about contemporary advancements, revolutionary methods, influential trends, best practice models and leadership techniques seek professional development and continuing education from the Center for Scholastic Inquiry.

products.name: Journal of Scholastic Inquiry: Behavioral Sciences (JOSI:BS)
